properties.displayName: Esentutl Volume Shadow Copy Service Keys
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where (InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "esentutl.exe" and RegistryKey contains "System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\VSS") and (not(RegistryKey contains "System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\VSS\\Start"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the volume shadow copy service initialization and processing via esentutl. Registry keys such as HKLM\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\VSS\\Diag\\VolSnap\\Volume are captured.
